You set the goal, Modev does the rest.

Learn More Get Involved

Technology moves at the speed of light -- Modev puts your initiatives at the tip of the spear. With nearly a decade of experience, Modev is a trusted technology community builder, producing powerful and engaging events. We’ve partnered with some of the largest brands in the world for multi-city, 1-day tours bringing together technologists and developers to learn, create and engage. The community building doesn’t stop there. Our team of specialists will create strategic plans to nurture and engage long after the skills building ends.

Let’s Build your Community

For nearly ten years Modev has built community and fostered personal connections in an era of digital transformation. We combine cutting edge technological solutions with a unique personal approach to support your business initiatives. Whether it’s recruiting behind-the-scene talent, cultivating brand awareness, or identifying your product’s audience--be it a company of coders or an individual consumer--Modev finds the community that will support your product’s purpose. Community-based recruiting increases brand recognition and positions your company as an employer of choice for top talent.

A Track Record of Success

Our clients have hired for numerous positions through talent they found via Modev recruitment events. Having targeted events that offer a professional development opportunity allows better candidate sourcing, reduced time-to-hire, and allows you to create community of engaged and interested individuals who are excited about your brand.

Who is your audience?

Whether you're looking for recent graduates or senior developers with a certain skill set, we get the right people in attendance and interacting with your organization's brand. By establishing personas early on, we're able to tailor the event marketing process and ultimately attract your ideal candidates effectively.

What are your goals?

You want to attract and hire top talent, but there is a long list of recruitment costs associated with traditional recruitment tactics. Top talent is getting tired of seeing the same approach, and competition to recruit and retain the best is greater than ever.

How do we reach them?

We organize communities and events where there is a need to bring together the right people and technologies. Events are an opportunity to grow your talent pool and make a lasting impression as an employer. Through one-day workshops, hackathons and other events, we offer a chance for attendees to learn new skills, expand their networks and get a behind the scenes look at your organization.

Execute an Effective Hackathon

Modev supports each of our partners throughout the Hackathon. As your partner, we will execute on-site logistics, facilitate collaboration and professional networking, and a foster a collaborative vision for your product’s potential.

Our approach is to draw in high-caliber, qualified candidates, start the conversation, and help you nurture the relationship. Ultimately, your organization's brand is kept top-of-mind and you're able to stand out among the competition and attract talent more easily by proactively establishing relationships.
